subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Dortmund, which is struggling in the Bundesliga, improved to 4-0 in the Champions League, while Arsenal gave up a three-goal lead to tie with Anderlecht, 3-3.
snippet: Dortmund, which is struggling in the Bundesliga, improved to 4-0 in the Champions League, while Arsenal gave up a three-goal lead to tie with Anderlecht, 3-3.
